data.name: EVE Online: Best of 2021 SKINs
data.detailed_description:
Steam Created Accounts Only

This content can only be accessed with EVE Online accounts created through Steam. Existing EVE Online accounts not created through Steam cannot benefit from it.


About the Game

The Best SKINs of 2021 bundle is perfect for players who have yet to add some of this year’s greatest SKINs to their personal fleet.

The collection covers a wide variety of ship types, offering a selection of stunning upgrades for both new and veteran players.

Contains:

  • Green Demons [Thanatos]
  • Rockbreaker Pioneers [Orca]
  • Vampire’s Hex [Gila]
  • Vampire’s Hex [Rattlesnake]
  • Ghost’s Hex [Orthrus]
  • Ghost’s Hex [Barghest]
  • Hazard Control [Loki]
  • Ultraviolence Vortex [Nyx]

data.short_description: Catch up on the best of this year’s SKINs with the Best SKINs of 2021 bundle. The contents include SKINs such as the Thanatos Green Demons, Orca Rockbreaker Pioneers, Gila and Rattlesnake Vampire’s Hex, Orthrus Ghost’s Hex, Nyx Ultraviolence Vortex, and more.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, Russian*, French*, Korean*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz, AMD Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB or higher
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB Free Space
  • Video: AMD Radeon 2600 XT or NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GTS
  • Network: ADSL connection (or faster)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 @ 3.6 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB or greater
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB free space
  • Video: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 or better with at least 4 GB VRAM
  • Network: ADSL connection or faster

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Supported OS: Mac OS X 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 2.5 GHz | Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB Free Space
  • Video: Intel HD 4000
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 12
  • Processor: Intel i7 Series @ 3.8 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB or higher
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB free space
  • Video: AMD Radeon Pro 5700 or better with at least 8 GB VRAM

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy EVE Online: Best of 2021 SKINs
